name: Battlegrounds2D.IO
description:
Battlegrounds2D.IO is a battle royale game.

The goal of Battlegrounds2D.IO is to be the last man standing.

You start as a player with no gear!
You have to find weapons, ammo, armor, medical and other items.
Kill every other player, except of your teammates 😏.
Be careful of the danger zone! Do not move outside of the red circle.

Gear up, loot, kill and get the 🐔 dinner!

This version of Battlegrounds2D.IO is completely ad-free.
A ad based version can be played on your browser on battlegrounds2.io.

Have fun
